resources.string: There has been no previous data found. Looks like this is your first time using the app. Please set up a master password for security.
Note that only alphanumeric (0-9, a-z, A-Z) and the following special characters !"#$%&'()*+,-./:; <=>?@[\]^_`{|}~ will be accepted
A new data file and corresponding master password has been created
